text:
F'Murr or F'Murrr (March 31, 1946 – April 10, 2018) whose real name was Richard Peyzaret, was a French comics creator. He was most famous for the long-running series "Le Génie des alpages" ("The Genius of the Mountain Pastures").
In 1978, F'Murr was awarded Angoulême International Comics Festival, Best Comic Book for "Barre-toi de mon herbe".
